plot: After the death of his mother, a young boy travels to China and become a master chef, in his attempt to become head chef of his late mother's restaurant
plot_en: After the death of his mother, a young boy travels to China and become a master chef, in his attempt to become head chef of his late mother's restaurant
plot_es: After the death of his mother, a young boy travels to China and become a master chef, in his attempt to become head chef of his late mother's restaurant
title: Chuka ichiban
